generated_body: The article titled "Myanmar accused at UN court of genocide against Rohingya" is likely to discuss the ongoing legal proceedings concerning allegations of genocide against the Rohingya people in Myanmar. Readers can expect an overview of the accusations presented at the United Nations court, including key details about the evidence provided by various human rights organizations and the response from the Myanmar government. The article may also explore the broader implications of these accusations for international law and human rights, as well as potential outcomes of the case, though specifics on these aspects remain uncertain.
